videos.title: Moonlight (2016)

videos.title: Our England (2022)
videos.description: England's women's football team, the Lionesses, aims for glory in the UEFA Women’s Euro 2022, and they've recruited a director and illustrator to make it a sticker-filled trip down nostalgia lane. Because, you know, we all fondly remember those panini stickers from our youth.

videos.alt_text: Sabrina Carpenter Ft. Jenna Ortega - Taste
videos.title: Sabrina Carpenter Ft. Jenna Ortega - Taste (2024)
videos.description: In Sabrina Carpenter's music video for "Taste," co-starring Jenna Ortega, the duo engage in a gory, darkly comedic rivalry over a two-timing boyfriend. Directed by Dave Meyers, the video features numerous campy horror and cult film references, including scenes inspired by Death Becomes Her and Kill Bill. Carpenter and Ortega repeatedly murder each other in elaborate ways, including stabbings, voodoo dolls, and falls from great heights, only to make up with a kiss. In collaboration with Jacobi Mehringer, Anna Arnell, and Lizzy Walker.
videos.additional_info:
Sabrina Carpenter Ft. Jenna Ortega - Taste (2024)
In Sabrina Carpenter's music video for "Taste," co-starring Jenna Ortega, the duo engage in a gory, darkly comedic rivalry over a two-timing boyfriend. Directed by Dave Meyers, the video features numerous campy horror and cult film references, including scenes inspired by Death Becomes Her and Kill Bill. Carpenter and Ortega repeatedly murder each other in elaborate ways, including stabbings, voodoo dolls, and falls from great heights, only to make up with a kiss. In collaboration with Jacobi Mehringer, Anna Arnell, and Lizzy Walker.
Technique - Horror , Over the Shoulder
Director - Dave Meyers
DOP - Scott Cunningham
Editor - Emile Doucette
Colorist - Dante Pasquinelli, ETHOS

videos.title: Watchtower of Turkey (2014)
videos.description: Described as a visual masterpiece, "Watchtower of Turkey" is praised for its breathtaking cinematography, dynamic soundtrack, and impeccable editing. The film takes viewers through vibrant cities and awe-inspiring landscapes, showcasing the country's remarkable diversity and beauty. It's more than just a travel video; it's a tribute to Turkey's rich culture, history, and natural wonders, crafted with an eye for detail and a knack for storytelling.
videos.additional_info:
Watchtower of Turkey (2014)
Described as a visual masterpiece, "Watchtower of Turkey" is praised for its breathtaking cinematography, dynamic soundtrack, and impeccable editing. The film takes viewers through vibrant cities and awe-inspiring landscapes, showcasing the country's remarkable diversity and beauty. It's more than just a travel video; it's a tribute to Turkey's rich culture, history, and natural wonders, crafted with an eye for detail and a knack for storytelling.
